item.title: Introduction to TFX pipelines
item.description: NOTE : This tutorial is a personal wrap-up of the TFX Pipeline Tutorial using the Penguin Dataset. The code used is identical, but I have added an introduction to TFX and several explanations for every section. The goal of this post to document my learning notes about TFX. What is TFX, and why is needed? Machine Learning is more than getting data, training models, and making predictions. A wide range of constraints and requirements need to be addressed for ML to add value in the real world:
